data.title: Big Fish Games no purchase found
data.text:
Page content loaded

Question marked as Top-ranking reply

User profile for user: SomeguyfromSD

User level: Level 1

8 points

Same issue. Games I know I purchased say that No Purchases is Found for this Account. Some I have only played once. Apple needs to get this resolved. Yes, it is a Big Fish Game, but I purchased these games from Apple.

Link

User profile for user: ss3110

User level: Level 1

8 points

*UPDATE*

I have found if I go to purchase again and press to buy it comes up with a message saying I’ve already bought, do I want to get it for free. This seems to have worked in restoring the games

Link

User profile for user: Drew_7

User level: Community Specialist

Hi MCFFan66,

From what you've shared the best steps to take for your issue can be found in the following article: If there's an issue when you redownload apps, movies, or other content from Apple - Apple Support

Specifically, review the following.

If you don't see the item that you want to redownload

* Make sure that the item is in your purchase history for your Apple ID. If you don't see the item in your purchase history, you might have purchased the item with a different Apple ID.

* If you don't see an app that you want to redownload, that app might not be compatible with your device. For example, an app that you bought for your Mac might not also work on your iPhone or Apple Watch.

* If you don't see items in your purchase history on other Apple IDs, the purchases might be hidden. Learn how to redownload hidden apps or unhide music, movies, TV shows, books and audiobooks.

* Do you want to redownload an app or other content that a family member purchased? If you have Family Sharing, you can download shared purchases.

Best regards.

Link

User profile for user: judysings

User level: Community Specialist

Good afternoon MCFFan66,

Did you try to delete the app and then redownload it? Make sure you have a backup of your iPhone before performing these troubleshooting steps.

Delete apps on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch - Apple Support

Redownload apps and games from Apple - Apple Support

If you still are not able to open the app after redownloading, contact Apple for help with this: Get Support

Take care.

Link

User profile for user: ss3110

User level: Level 1

8 points

Glad I’m not the only one. Apple and big fish are no help. Big fish have me things to try which didn’t work so sent me to apple. Apple said they can’t do anything. I can see the invoices showing I’ve paid for apps and it’s telling me no purchase found. Funny because a couple of them work but most don’t. So annoying because I really enjoy the games and have been playing them for years!

Link

User profile for user: glensboxers1

User level: Level 1

12 points

Big fish games on iPad and iPhone will no longer work IF… they are under IOS10 and under 32 bit games. So all your older games will now say something like no account found, or just won’t download. If u want to buy a new game make sure it is for IOS 10 and above and make sure it is not a 32 but game. I hope this helps. This is an apple decision not big fish. I suggest playing in the computer or laptop which has nothing to do with Apple.

Link
